original_title: Entre a Luz e o Nada
overview: The body melts in sweat and the afternoon fades into endless nights. Weird dreams invade Shade’s sleep and unexplainable lights appear in the sky. Between work, home and friends, Shade seems to be floating. They are in suspension, in an intermediate state in which the reality of the world does not sustain itself.
tagline: It’s Summer and it feels like everything is melting.
title: Between Light and Nowhere
